scripts.start:prod: npx prisma db push --skip-generate && cd ../.. && NODE_PATH=apps/api/node_modules node dist/main
scripts.db:export: PGPASSWORD=E198373 pg_dump -h localhost -U postgres -d EG_Antiq --data-only --inserts > /tmp/eg_antiq_data.sql && echo 'Data exported to /tmp/eg_antiq_data.sql'
scripts.db:import: docker cp /tmp/eg_antiq_data.sql backend-postgres:/tmp/data.sql && docker exec backend-postgres psql -U postgres -d EG_Antiq -f /tmp/data.sql && echo 'Data imported to Docker database'
scripts.db:copy: npm run db:export && npm run db:import
scripts.db:sync: npm run db:export && docker exec backend-postgres psql -U postgres -d EG_Antiq -c 'TRUNCATE users, refresh_tokens, roles, user_roles CASCADE;' && npm run db:import
